title: Political representation
itunes:author: Professor Anne Phillips
description: Contributor(s): Professor Anne Phillips | Political representation in a democracy doesn't necessarily reflect the variety of people within a society. Most noticeably, there is a much lower percentage of women acting as representatives than there is in the wider population. Does this matter? Anne Phillips believes it does.
